Willie Hughes

  1. Foster Name: Wilfred Hughes Roy
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Wilford
  3. Foster Family: Frank and Emily Roy
  4. Location of Family: Auburn, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Auburn, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 4
  8. Date of Birth: 1911-XX-XX, New York City, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1990, VT
  10. Gender: male
  11. Spouse Name: Elizabeth Janette Roy
  12. Source: Nemaha County Herald (Auburn, NE), 15 February 1915, and 21 May 1926, and 28 August 1931, and 23 June 1938, and 7 July 1938, and 11 February 1943, and 10 October 1946; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; Wilfred Roy Gravestone, Craftsbury Common Cemetery, Craftsbury, VT.
